name: Dark Golbat
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: Sneaks up silently on its prey and attacks it from behind, sometimes killing it with one bite.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: When you play Dark Golbat from your hand, you may choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. If you do, Dark Golbat does 10 damage to that Pokémon. Apply Weakness and Resistance.

attacks.name: Flitter
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for this attack. (Any other effects that would happen after applying Weakness and Resistance still happen.)
